name: Cookie Link Pop 3 Match Journey Splash And Soda Jam
name_original: Cookie Link Pop 3 Match Journey Splash And Soda Jam
description:
This game is a very addictive and best match-three casual game in the apple store!
How to play:
1. Connect three or more same cookie splash to score points.
2. Archive the target points to level up.
3. Eliminate the more cookie line quickly can get extra scores.
Game features:
1. More than 200+ challenging levels & many game props.
2. The Fire props can eliminate cookie in one row.
3. The Water props can eliminate the cookie around.
4. The Ice props can unfreeze the frozen cookie.
5. Sweet and delicious UI & cool animation effects.
6. Play the game and Have Fun!!!
